bio:
Michael Ciccarelli is a full-stack web developer with over a decade of experience building high-performing applications for consumer markets (e-commerce, social platforms) and B2B SaaS (finance, marketing, and more).

Based in Brooklyn, he runs an independent software consultancy, partnering with brands, startups, and individuals across industries to create impactful digital experiences.

projects.title: The Bar
projects.description: Awards/Portfolio site for an Amazon internal creative agency using Next.js, TailwindCSS and Framer Motion. Sanity for headless CMS.

projects.title: KelvonAgee.com
projects.description: Portfolio site for a Producer/Director/Photographer using Next.js, TailwindCSS and Framer Motion. Cloundinary for CDN.

projects.title: Fig Buffalo
projects.description: Event page for a Buffalo fashion show — built with Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Stripe for ticket sales.

projects.title: Metal
projects.description: decentralized app built with Next.js, Viem, & Privy. Smart contract deployments, starter templates, visualize and interact with onchain data.

projects.title: pod.xyz
projects.description: dapp built with Next.js, Ethers, and React Flow spatial interface for visualizing smart contracts and blockchain data.

projects.title: ELARA.WORLD
projects.description: Community site for Elara Pictures, to feature music, videos, and merch. Built with Next.js, Sanity, and Shopify headless.

projects.title: The BAR
projects.description: Portfolio site built with Next.js + Sanity.io headless CMS

projects.title: The Well
projects.description: Editorial and e-commerce site built with Next.js, Shopify, and Sanity

projects.title: Revolve Law
projects.description: Single-page website for a law firm, built with React and Framer motion.

projects.title: Common Studio
projects.description: Single-page, lead gen website, built with Next.js and Contentful CMS.

projects.title: G9 Ventures
projects.description: Portfolio site for a VC firm, built with React.js.

projects.title: VICE TV
projects.description: Video streaming for VICE, built with React, Node, and Video.js

projects.title: Design Tool
projects.description: Tool for designers to configure custom wall panels, built with Vue and d3.js
